pullrequest.title: use CMAKE_INSTALL_LIBDIR in pkg-config example test in case an arch-dependent lib folder is used

content.raw:
Based on this information, I think we are ok if we don't merge this pull request but keep the patch in the debian metadata. I think our CI will keep working, and the debbuilds should keep working.

* #!/ignitionrobotics/ign-cmake1-release/commits/c20b79b3596e7ff75b38d92b0054941624e39be0

The only main downside is that the patch may have conflicts in the future

Any thoughts @\_jrivero_ ?
content.html:
Based on this information, I think we are ok if we don't merge this pull request but keep the patch in the debian metadata. I think our CI will keep working, and the debbuilds should keep working.

  • #!/ignitionrobotics/ign-cmake1-release/commits/c20b79b3596e7ff75b38d92b0054941624e39be0

Any thoughts @_jrivero_ ?
